column5: Does anyone have a trailer in a trailer park, how does the insurance thing work.  The reason I ask is that it really isn't a trailer any more, it is a cabin built around a trailer. Thanks YB

I have a Trailer in a park however it is your standard trailer..nothing built up around it. Insurance seems to be resonable..I believe we pay $20 a month. Don't know what to recommend in your situation.
well, take some pictures of it set a value on it walking your favourite insurance company and ask them for a price on whatever they wish to call it  pay  enjoy trailer/whatever
Find a broker who has AVIVA Elite available...best trailer package going!
